language.lang_desc: Confirm identity of the carrier and the number of the vehicle
Confirm Authenticity of Excise official stamp
Confirm Authenticity of Company's Stamp and Trader's signature
Confirm Trader's Authorisation and SEED Data
Hearing of authorised representative (e.g. interview of company manager)
Provide proof that the movement of excise goods has ended
Confirm purpose of goods or next purchaser of goods

Inform if the movement has already been released by Customs
